response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. I understand its significance and would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. Considering its high worth and the opportunity it presents, I am proposing a special introductory price of $1,100,000 for this exceptional item. This is a limited-time offer, designed to recognize your interest and commitment. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this unique opportunity. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this valuable acquisition for you.", "product_price": 1100000}
